|asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"Ruckus Wireless" and "Giterdone 6" is silkscreened on the top :of the board in the FCC photos and on a production unit's board. :"FAB 1001200 REV D" is on the back of the board. *"2976268903 REV G" is silkscreened (w/ additional non-silkscreened text :of "FAB 1001200 REV G") on the bottom of the board of a production unit. *The production board is using a [[Microchip]] (''SST'') [https://www.microchip.com/wwwproducts/Devices.aspx?dDocName=en550350 SST12LP15A] PAM. :The production board is using all '''TAICON''' capacitors. ===PSU=== The power adapter included with the device seems to be a '''DVE''' DSA-12R-12 :AUS 120120 (100-120VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.3A -> 12VDC, 1A). ==Links of Interest== *[https://support.ruckuswireless.com/products/2-mediaflex-2111/documents Documents for the device on the '''Ruckus''' site] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=36556 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(TxD) (GND) (...) (...) (RxD)
  ©     ©     ®     ®     ©
  5     4     3     2     1
> C107
===Credentials=== .. presumably the standard ''[[Ruckus Wireless]]'' ones.. 
Username: super
Password: sp-admin
